author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Depending on the usage, had to choose different ways of expressing it.  Didn't change use of `hanging` for formatting as that term is specific.

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/5147

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: did you look for `hung` as well?

title: replace the word `hang` with something more appropriate
